title: ( OFFTIME ) - Distraction Free
summary: allows the user to initiate downtime periods during which calls, notifications, and distracting apps are blocked - only whitelisted contacts are let through; auto-replies are sent out to ppl trying to get in touch; also tracks and visualises phone use

title: (NO)tifications
summary: hide the unread messages notifications in the title bar on tabs

title: `Tabula
summary: distraction-free writing app

title: Absolock | Phone Locking app
summary: locks phone for a set amount of time - can't be turned off

title: Addicted - phone usage tracker
summary: tracks and visualises unlocks and global usage

title: Afairo
summary: feature removal for LinkedIn (ads and 'ppl also viewed') and Wikia (ads and 'trending' sidebar)

title: AIM
summary: start focus sessions during which sites on blacklist are blocked; a password is required to type in in order to override; a simple sketch of an angry face is shown when blocked sites are attempted accessed

title: ANNoy Distractions
summary: make websites on a blacklist annoying to use - e.g. by making images and links shake, playing fart noises when scrolling, or having a dinosaur pop onto the page

title: Anti Smartphone Addiction
summary: set timer for period user doesn't want to use their phone; while timer counts down, receive suggestions of alternative things to do instead

title: Anti-Internet-Addiction Timer
summary: countdown timer for smartphone where you list what work activity you'd like to do, then what online leisure activity you'll allow yourself afterwards, before engaging in the activity, to scaffold focus

title: AntiSocial: phone addiction
summary: track and visualise phone use - unlocks, global, and apps - and compare stats to other users; also has blocking tools - set daily limits for global phone use or apps, or block during certain hours, or for certain session duration

title: App Blocker (Stay Focused)
summary: app blocker which can show customisable motivational text when blocked apps are attempted accessed; can work in sessions, schedules, or time limits

title: App Gatekeeper -Curb Addiction
summary: tracks and visualises app usage; can block apps when used for certain amount of time, or during certain hours; can require password to change settings (app advocates getting friend to set password), or only let settings be set after certain amount of days have passed

title: App Off Timer
summary: set limits for how long an app can be used in one go before it's shut down with a custom delay before it can be opened again; or block apps during specific hours; or block apps after total duration of use; 'prevent uninstallation' function

title: App Usage - Manage/Track Usage
summary: track and visualise app use, notification numbers, unlocks; get reminders when phone used for more than specific amount of time

title: App Usage Tracker- Apps Time
summary: track app and global usage - similarly to the app Moment, this one requires the user to take a screenshot of their battery page

title: AppBlock - Stay Focused
summary: blocks any app; can do this during pre-scheduled times, at specific locations, or after certain amount of time has been spent; informs the user how many times they've tried to access a blocked app and suggest what they could do instead; has a 'strict mode' in which the app can't be uninstalled and corresponding devices settings are blocked

title: AppDetox - App Blocker for Digital Detox
summary: set rules for app use - e.g. block after certain amount of time has been spent, or after have been launched for x number of times; can optionally not be turned off, or can optionally be overridden with password; when app is used, show e.g. how many minutes or launches are left to use in the day; see how many times the user has broken her own rules

title: Appology
summary: tracks app use and displays pie chart of how time is spent; can show for daily, weekly, monthly, yearly

title: AppTym: Phone Usage Tracker & App Monitor
summary: tracks and visualises smartphone use; breaks usage down by category; enables user to set time limits and reminder; can overlay current app with a visual display of how much time has been spent within it; get daily reports and summaries

title: AppUseFree Show App Usage Time
summary: identical to PhoneUseFree except that it collects data also on individual app use

title: Are you sure?
summary: when visiting distracting site, shows pop-up asking the user they are sure? ; pop-up shows at most once every 5 minutes

title: Artiquill
summary: minimal writing app, which also lets you set writing goals and see your progress relative to them

title: Asocial
summary: hides news feed on 'popular social media sites' (Facebook, Twitter, Vk.com, Ok.ru); either always or during scheduled hours; replaces with the text "There is nothing you are looking for. Go and work, my friend."

title: Auto Logout
summary: automatically logs user out of facebook, twitter and quora after 10 mins

title: Banish
summary: website blocker for safari on iOS - simply add sites to a blacklist

title: Barepress
summary: minimal writing tool for Wordpress - can hide left navigation bar and right panel, or make editor full-screen, upon click

title: Bashful: stop procrastinating
summary: locks the home screen for specified or scheduled length of time, or at specified location; if access is needed, a button can be held down for 5 secs to give phone access for 20 secs

title: Be Productive! Search & Avoid Homepage Distraction
summary: minimal homepage plus direct search from the homepage without any distractions; lets the user also directly type in notes for their search results

title: BeePresent
summary: social 'locking out of use' app - points can be collected for not using the phone during a session, and others can be invited to join the session

title: Blacklist - Website Blocker
summary: website blocker for safari on iOS - simply add sites to a blacklist, then start a focus period

title: BlackOut: Stay Focused/Beat Phone Addiction
summary: Block phone access during scheduled times (except for phone calls and a whitelist of apps)

title: Blank New Tab Page
summary: makes new tabs completely blank

title: Block & Focus
summary: block websites for specified time; show motivational quote when trying to access blocked sites; can work in pomodoro mode of work/break cycles; button to pause it can be hidden; track and display work history

title: Block Apps - More Productivity & Focus
summary: blocks distracting apps either during session or pre-scheduled; option to prevent turning off or uninstallation; notification reminders of active blocks and their end times

title: Block Distracting Websites
summary: website blocker for safari on iOS - simply add sites to a blacklist

title: Block Site - Block Distracting Apps & Sites
summary: blocks any apps or websites during specified times or permanently

title: Block Site - Website Blocker for Chrome™
summary: from the same company as the 'Block Site' app; add websites or pages to block list, then be redirected to other sites when trying to access them; can be used with pomodoro timer; can work in whitelist or blacklist mode

title: Blocksite
summary: minimal website blocker - blocks sites on blacklist without any additional frills or messages

title: BlockSites - Sprint
summary: start 'sprint' session for specific length, during which websites on a blacklist are blocked; shows countdown timer

title: Break Addiction
summary: destroys the user interface on blacklisted websites - i.e. scrambles it and makes it full of random colours

title: BreakFree - Limit Screen Time!
summary: tracks and visualises global use; compare yourself with other users: app claims to correlate this data with (physical?) activity levels

title: Breathe: Website blocker
summary: when turned on, replaces distracting sites (not customisable) with reminders to breathe (animated lotus slowly contracting and expanding)

title: bSociable - an effective way to control your smartphone addiction!
summary: collect 'social time' when not using one's smartphone; the user can see how they compare against others in the amount of collected social time

title: BusyBee
summary: add sites to a blocklist, then the extension can either i) show pop-up asking whether visiting the site is really necessary, when attempted accessed (it will pop up again periodically if the user proceeds), or ii) block those sites altogether

title: Cat Feed
summary: replaces Facebook's newsfeed with a cat gif ('avoid distractions while still being entertained')

title: Cell Phone Addiction Timer - Screen Time Unplugged
summary: set limit goals for how much to use phone, then get reminders when limit is exceeded; also has a 'challenge' with a countdown timer where you try not to use your phone and it tracks whether you succeeded

title: Charity Jar
summary: send money to a charity when you unlock your phone; there's a monthly donation limit to make sure you don't spend all your money by mistake

title: Checkout of your phone
summary: checkout' of your phone, collect virtual points for the minutes it's not used; Facebook friends can be invited to checkout together; see stats of how long has been checked out for

title: Checky - Phone Habit Tracker
summary: Tracks the number of times phone is unlocked per day

title: Cinema Mode
summary: blacks out all elements except for the video being watched

title: Citrus
summary: block sites on blacklist for specified amount of time; show motivational quote

title: Clar
summary: feature remover for Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Instagram, and YouTube, in Safari on iOS; removes newsfeed, recommended vids, etc.

title: Clarity
summary: replaces new tabs with simple image, clock and prompt to type in what's on your mind; when user starts to type, a distraction-free writing environment appears

title: Clarity - Website Blocker
summary: blocks websites on a blacklist or whitelist; is also able to hide Facebook's newsfeed; can be scheduled

title: Clean YouTube
summary: YouTube feature removal: removes all comments, recommended and related Videos

title: CleanTab
summary: replaces new tab content with a minimal writing tool, which saves what the user types; screenshots demonstrates use of it to keep todo-notes

title: Clear Page
summary: reader-mode that removes images and other distracting elements from a page, when the extension icon is clicked

title: Clear Read
summary: reader-mode for chrome via button that can toggle off stripping out core content and presenting it in simple black text on white background

title: Click to Remove Element
summary: allows user to remove any elements on a website by clicking on them - works temporarily (single visit)

title: Clocked-In
summary: tracks how much time are spent on which websites, and visualises it in a pie chart

title: Codeforces WA Questions FB News Feed
summary: replaces Facebook's newsfeed with pending questions on Codeforces - when there are none, get message of encouragement and suggestion to try out new ones at Codeforces

title: Cold Turkey
summary: Lock phone access for a specific length of time.

title: Compose - Send email without distraction
summary: little info in description; minimal email app in which you can compose emails without your inbox

title: Concentrate
summary: blocks distracting sites (not customisable) when extension is turned on, and replaces them with motivational pictures

title: Consciously.Life
summary: replace ads with inspirational images of the user's own choice; also lets the user ad todo-list items and inspirational stuff to new tabs

title: Custom New Tab
summary: more minimal design for new tabs, showing favorite sites, installed apps, and selected bookmark links

title: Cut the crap - undistracted browsing
summary: reader view which displays only the content of articles visited by default - can be toggled off

title: Daily Motivation - Motivational Quotes
summary: replaces new tab content with motivational quote

title: Daily Notes - Distraction-Free
summary: simple minimal writing app

title: Dayboard: New Tab & Site Blocker
summary: replaces new tab with todo-list that can hold up to 5 items; also incorporates site blocker which blocks blacklisted sites when they've been visited for more than 10 mins/day; can be incorporated with a team, so that tasks pull in to a manager's dashboard

title: deface
summary: remove everything except for chat from Facebook

title: deReddit
summary: Intended to make Reddit less distracting: makes all links purple (so there's no excitement of new links), hides vote counts, hides which domains links come from

title: DeskTrainer
summary: counts time on distracting websites; when time has elapsed distracting sites are replaced with workout instructions, showing exercises from the '7-minute workout'; provides an option to add a 30 sec penalty if a workout is skipped

title: Detox for Facebook
summary: replaces Facebook's newsfeed with feeds from 'positively distracting' sites, e.g. Hacker News

title: Detox Procrastination Blocker: Digital Detox
summary: locks entire device for specific length of time; can't be turned off; track and display history of time spent locking phone

title: DF Tube (Distraction Free for YouTube™)
summary: disables autoplay, hides recommendations sidebar, related videos, grid of recommended videos that appear on homepage; optionally also hide comments and disable playlists sitewide

title: Digital Detox: Focus and fight phone addiction
summary: take 'digital detox' challenges where you lock your phone for a specified amount of time; you get points and praise if you succeed; it can be overriden if really needed

title: DinnerMode
summary: choose amount of time to not use phone by placing it facedown - if phone not touched during this time, get encouraging message and suggestion to tweet out how long phone wasn't used for

title: Distracting pages blocker
summary: block websites on a block list; when trying to access them, display message showing how many times the user have attempted to enter them

title: Distraction Free Youtube
summary: Removes related or recommended video links from YouTube

title: Distraction-free Facebook Chat UI
summary: Facebook feature removal: hide everything except for chat. Displays a "Hide/show Facebook" button (you have to click to hide the first time)

title: Distraction-free Homestuck
summary: reader-mode for Homestuck (a particular comic / graphic novel)

title: DistractionOff
summary: block websites on blacklist when toggled on; customisable to start either off or on when browser is opened;

title: DistractOff
summary: blocks distracting websites during specified hours; can be overridden temporarily on the 'shouldn't you be working' page that's shown, but a custom delay time set before override occurs

title: DM Redirect
summary: redirects to the Guardian when the user tries to browse to the Daily Mail

title: Do Not Disturb - Mute it
summary: reject incoming calls (with auto-reply) and mute notifications during specified hours - it's basically like a granular Do Not Disturb feature

title: Do Not Disturb for Gmail
summary: extension for gmail which only allows emails to come in at specific times, in order to make the inbox less distracting

title: Don't Visit - Block Sites
summary: block websites on blacklist; by default can't be overridden though the ability to do so can be enabled

title: Donut Dog: Feed your focus!
summary: set timer for how long the user wishes not to use their phone; as long as they stay in the app while a timer counts down, the app generates virtual donuts; this stops when the app is left; collect virtual points and rewards

title: Draco.
summary: distraction-free writing app

title: Dumbphone
summary: blocks internet connectivity and app use for specified amount of time; Time lag for overrride. Tracks how many times you have overriden.

title: Dyve
summary: blocks notifications and sounds for specified length of time; sends auto-replies to ppl trying to get in touch

title: Elenco
summary: replaces new tab content with a todo-list

title: Facebook Chat Only
summary: Facebook feature removal: hides everything except for the chat, when the extension icon is clicked

title: Fame or Shame : Anti Procrastination Timer
summary: countdown timer; if phone is not used, get rewarded by motivational quote, if phone used, get a snarky sarcastic comment as punishment

title: FB Newsfeed Killer
summary: Facebook feature removal: remove the newsfeed

title: Feed the Goat
summary: feed a virtual goat by entering focus sessions where you promise not to visit your blacklisted websites - if blacklisted websites are visited before countdown is over, a popup asks whether you really want to visit the website, 'cause if you do your goat will die'; the cash balance you build up by succeeding can be used to purchase new goats

title: Feedless - Newsfeed Blocker
summary: removes newsfeeds on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter, when visited through Safari

title: FishCure:stay focused
summary: Forest clone; countdown timer in which you breed fish; get notifications if you leave the app

title: FLIP - Focus Timer for Study
summary: measures study time when flipping phone over; tracks and visualises study time; also sets challenges; tries to schedule tasks (e.g. 'practice grammar') in empty spots in calendar

title: Flipd — Stay Focused, Remove Distractions
summary: block apps and notifications during focus time - tracks and visualises progress; schedule reminders for focus time; can collect 'streaks'

title: Flora - Focus, Study, Pomodoro
summary: Forest clone, but with multi-user functionality: set a timer for non-use during which trees are being grown; a session can be participated in by multiple users; the tree dies if any of the users leave the app before the time is us; track and visualise progress

title: Focus
summary: hides Facebook's newsfeed

title: Focus
summary: block websites on blacklist; when the user tries to access them, a customisable motivational message ('what's your epic dream?' is the prompt for coming up with these) is displayed on top of an image

title: Focus
summary: reader mode - when user right clicks > 'focus', it adds a dark overlay to everything except for a bright square which can be moved on top of the content the user wishes to focus on

title: Focus
summary: blocks websites on blacklist for specific duration of time; also tracks and visualises time spent past 7 days on websites

title: Focus
summary: blocks blacklisted sites during 'focus sessions' - during a session, a page is shown which has a countdown for current focus session and reminds the user to get back to work; when focus session is over, displays a message with how many times during the session the user tried to access blacklisted sites

title: focus
summary: start focus session; during these have three blacklists: one for sites that should be totally blocked, one for sites where the user should get a nudge asking them if they really need to go there; and one for sites on which visit time should be limited

title: Focus
summary: replaces new tab content with todo list that also has 'start focusing' button; when this button is clicked, a 25 min work session is started where websites on a blacklist are blocked and a countdown timer shown when you try to access them; shows log of what has been done

title: Focus - Be Productive!
summary: lock phone entirely for specific period; can be overridden if button is held down for 5 seconds; allows emergency calls; has strict mode where it can't be turned off; customisable message on lock screen during locked period

title: Focus - Stay Concentrated
summary: choose amount of time not to use phone; if leaving the app before the countdown is over, the user does not collect any virtual points and trophies

title: Focus - Website Blocker
summary: temporarily blocks websites on blacklist

title: Focus 45
summary: blocks websites on customisable blocklist for specific duration of time; can be overridden for specified length of time by entering a code shown

title: Focus Booster (Beta)
summary: start work session for specified amount of time, during which specified websites are either blocked or have their notifications muted

title: Focus by Axon
summary: set timer for how long the user wishes not to use their phone; as long as they stay in the app while a timer counts down, the user collects virtual candy; this stops when the app is left; the virtual candies can be exchanged for virtual cats

title: Focus Cat
summary: block distracting websites, then show a picture of a sad cat with a sort of motivational question (Why You No Do Work?) when those websites are attempted accessed

title: Focus Cat App - Focus Timer
summary: set timer for duration where you don't want to use your phone - while the countdown is on, a cat appears in a box; if the app is left before the time runs out, the cat runs away - otherwise it moves into a cat house; multiple types of cat can be collected

title: Focus Drive - Pomodoro Timer
summary: choose amount of time not to use phone; an animated car starts driving; if leaving the app before the countdown is over, the car will crash and no points will be collected; see stats over how you've done; option to focus in a group, so that if any one person leaves the app, the car crashes

title: Focus Mode
summary: toggle 'focus mode' on or off - during focus mode, websites on blacklist are blocked, and a 'return to work' image is shown. Also measures 'distraction attempts,.

title: Focus Reader View
summary: reader-mode modelled after Safari's reader

title: Focus Timer - Study & Work Timer
summary: set a countdown timer, then if the user leaves the app before they countdown is over they will receive reminders to go back to the app and the task they were trying to achieve; if they do not, they lose their 'focus streak'; scores can be shared with friends; user can set a title for the session (e.g. 'studying for midterm exam') which is used for the reminder to go back to the app

title: Focus: Limit Distracting Apps, End Procrastination
summary: block blacklisted apps when they've been used for longer than X minutes in total; option to block all apps entirely; option to demand password for override; option to send motivational reminders to oneself every X minutes

title: Focus.me
summary: blocks blacklisted websites either for a session of a specified length, or during certain hours; can't be turned off; when trying to access a blacklisted site, get a motivational quote and a countdown timer for the session

title: Focusbook (Facebook News Feed Remover)
summary: hides Facebook's newsfeed and shows a customisable "you could be doing X instead" message

title: Focuser
summary: reader mode which hides links and GIFs when button is clicked

title: Focusly
summary: block websites for session of specified duration; a long sequence of arrow keys must be typed in correctly to override

title: FocusMe: A Pomodoro Timer and Website Blocker
summary: mix of pomodoro timer and website blocker - blocks website on blacklist during work session of X minutes, then allows them for break session of X minutes

title: Focussu Pro - Stay Focussed and Remove Online Distractions
summary: safari iOS website blocker - simply add to a blacklist

title: FocusTube
summary: YouTube feature removal: hides most content on homepage (channels, videos) plus comments and recommended videos

title: FokisOn
summary: app in which ppl start 'moments' together where a counter counts down during non-use and you collect points and 'win' if you are able to not use your phone for other purposes until countdown timer has run out

title: Fokus
summary: sets length of time during which blocked sites can't be accessed again - e.g. it doesn't block Facebook at first visit, but when left, the user has two wait X minutes before they will be allowed to go to the site again

title: FOMO - Beat Your Phone Addiction
summary: tracks and displays phone usage in numbers; Lists most used apps, most called contacts, and phone call duration; uses tracked data to calculate a FOMO score, which can be shared with friends and family

title: Forest Grow - Motivation Alarm
summary: clone of 'Forest' - plant virtual trees that die if you leave the app before the countdown is over; timers and notes show time where phone hasn't been used

title: Forest: Stay focused
summary: let virtual trees grow when you're supposed to focus; virtual trees are killed if app quit or blacklisted app used; virtual tree points can be spent on planting real trees in the real world; you can look back on the trees built; can also track daily phone usage and screen time

title: Forest: stay focused, be present
summary: chrome version of the Forest app: plant trees with countdown; the tree dies if websites on blacklist are visited before countdown is over; trees can be 'shared with friends'

title: Forests:Focus
summary: Another Forest clone which grows trees during non-use

title: Forward with Message[FwM]
summary: lets the user block web pages, display a custom message for 7 seconds, then redirect to another custom URL

title: Free Pause Gmail
summary: adds 'pause inbox' button to gmail, which hides incoming emails for a certain interval or until the button is ticked again

title: Freedom - Website Blocker for Chrome
summary: block specific websites or all of the web for specified duration of time; can be scheduled

title: Friction for Facebook
summary: Feature removal for Facebook: makes alerts grey, notification box 'boring', and hides newsfeed by default and adds delay to loading it

title: Gen4
summary: type in goal, then be reminded about this goal now and then during a focus session (frequency is user-customisable); also lets user put sites on a blacklist that will be blocked during focus sessions

title: GIF Blocker
summary: hides GIFs

title: GitHub No Pressure
summary: GitHub feature removal: hide followers feed, contributions calendar, and streak counters

title: Glider
summary: adds filter to hide 'distracting' emails from email inbox; track email habits (time spent, activity); create profiles to help share email expectations with others

title: Gmail Label Toggler
summary: allows the user to toggle the display of labels on and off

title: Go Fucking Work
summary: redirects attempts to go to blacklisted sites to motivational and profane messages telling you to get back to work; allow blacklisted sites only during certain hours; user can ask for an additional break for a specified length;

title: Good Morning
summary: block websites on blacklist before noon; can be overridden for 5 mins by typing in a password verbatim

title: Goodnight Chrome
summary: blocks chrome from working during specified hours; when chrome is opened during these hours, it suggests 'fun' offline activities to do instead (e.g. reading a book or calling a loved one)

title: Goodtime productivity timer
summary: work timer which disables sound and internet connectivity during work sessions

title: GoOffline
summary: block phone from being used (except for emergency calls) for session of specific length, after certain amount of time has been spent on phone, or during specific hours

title: Goyfaw
summary: choose amount of time not to use phone; if leaving the app before the countdown is over, the user is sent non-stop notifications until they enter the app again

title: Grayrify
summary: turns selected websites into grayscale

title: Grayscale - Remove Colors
summary: turns current page or tab into black/white

title: Guilt
summary: pop-up asks you what user wants to use the internet for, and for how long; when time's up, it masks all open tabs and asks user if they've completed the task they set out to complete; if yes, it closes all tabs and opens up new blank one; if no, the user can request another chunk of time; keeps a log of all reasons given to use the web, which the user can review

title: Habit Time Tracker And Control
summary: grow trees while a timer counts down; track global time spent on phone plus pickups and visualise it; has the idea that it takes 21 days to form a habit, so focuses on getting ppl to track themselves over 21 days

title: HabitLab
summary: set goals for how you'd like to use the web; then habitlab rotates between ~15 different kinds of interventions (e.g. hide videos, hide newsfeed, ask if you're really doing what you want) to find out what works; track and visualise web use relative to goal; has tutorial showing users how to create their own nudges, or vote on or submit ideas for new ones; Can be always-on or only during 'work hours.'

title: Help Me Focus - Limit Distraction
summary: block apps for specified length of time, or during specified hours

title: Help Me Work!
summary: blocks specific list of distracting websites (not customisable), and displays a 'STOP! Get back to work!' page which includes a Donald Trump photo with a 'get back to work or you're fired' caption

title: HelpMeFocus - Block Distractions, Stay Focused.
summary: block distracting apps on blocklist during specific hours or for a session of specific duration; create different profiles of blocked apps; shows motivational quotes when trying to access those apps; can be overridden with password; has strict mode hindering uninstallation; "smart unlock" or cheat mode, that allows user to view a blocked app for a short period of time.

title: Hide Doodles
summary: replace Google Doodles (i.e when google displays a fancy complex version of their logo) with their standard logo

title: Hide GIFS I'am Reading
summary: adds button to chrome which you can toggle on to remove GIFs

title: Hide Images/Videos
summary: removes all images and videos from a website, when the extension icon is clicked

title: Hide YouTube Comments, Live Chat, & Related
summary: YouTube feature removal: hides comments, live chat, and related videos

title: HideHNComments
summary: Hacker News feature removal: hides comments

title: HN Overload
summary: new chrome tabs will display how long it's been since last visit to Hacker News, and also how long on average between each visit

title: Hooked Pro - Track Phone Habit and Know Your Usage
summary: track global time spent on phone and also get information about phone addiction

title: I don't care about your likes
summary: hides likes and notifications on Facebook (customisable); a timer can be set for a duration where settings can't be changed

title: idle
summary: Tracks idle (time away from phone) and active (time on phone). Sends notifications after certain amount of time idle or active

title: iFocusMode - Get Off Phone, Self Restriction
summary: blocks selected apps for specific duration of time - can involve real money payments if user fails

title: Inbox When Ready for Gmail
summary: Extension for gmail - hides inbox by default, then show it when button is pressed; user can set length of time they want to spend in inbox and/or how many times they'd like to check their inbox - then they get visual feedback on how they're doing compared to that goal; can also operate during scheduled hours; hide category tab notifications; when inbox is hidden, displays counter of how many times it's been checked and for how long

title: Influencer: Productive & Motivational
summary: blocks websites on a blacklist and instead shows motivational quotes; shows a counter of how many times you've tried to access them

title: Infocus
summary: block websites on blacklist by either closing tab or going back to previous page; in order to disable the extension, the user has to answer five simple math questions; the disable page also displays a motivational message; a time can be set for the blocking to turn off

title: Information Visualization of Browser History
summary: Track and visualise browser history in bubble charts, time series, and graphs

title: Intent.
summary: tracks and visualises web usage; asks user how they feel about their use the past week; if they felt bad about it, asks what their goal is for changing behaviour - reducing frequency of visits or reducing overall time?; then extension displays a pop-up if the user violates the set goal, with three options: getting a 2 more minutes on the site, 10 more minutes, or saying 'I'm done for today' (which presumably closes the tab)

title: Internet Addiction Calendar - Join the no internet movement, and quit internet while you can!
summary: app to use when user feels the urge to go to the internet - gives the user badges, motivational quotes, information about internet addiction, and pictures of puppies; also counter for user to keep track of days when they don't use the web

title: InternetBook
summary: redirects Facebook to alternative sites where you can 'learn something new'

title: Its Study Time - Study effectively
summary: study timer - either pure countdown, stopwatch, or pomodoro; mutes notifations during study time

title: JotterPad - Writer, Screenplay, Novel
summary: distraction-free writing app; customisable typography

title: Just Read
summary: customisable reader mode (styling of reader mode is customisable); can be set to auto-run on specific pages

title: Just Write - Minimalistic Writing App For Writer
summary: distraction-free writing app

title: Keep Me Out
summary: lock the user out of their phone (except for emergency calls and answering calls) for session of specified length, or during scheduled hours

title: Kill News Feed
summary: Facebook feature removal: replace newsfeed with 'Don't get distracted by Facebook!' message

title: Kill Tweet Stream
summary: hides Twitter's news feed

title: Let Me Read
summary: Minimal reading app that works on 8 specific pre-defined sites; activated by clicking extension icon
Feature min.: Site: Facebook, Smashing Magazine, Wikipedia, CSS-Tricks,Tutsplus,.net Magazine,WebdesignerDepot,Noupe

title: Liberate - Reduce Distractions
summary: website blocker for iOS; blocks websites for specified period of time; display progress through that period

title: Life Is Too Short
summary: replaces new tab content with a counter showing amount of time left until your youth is over, your 'golden age' (until 55) is over, the current month, etc.

title: Light New Tab
summary: blank new tab

title: Lights off
summary: puts a dark overlay over everything except for posts on the newsfeed, so they can be read without distractions

title: Limit Social Media Distractions
summary: removes feeds and recommendations on facebook, twitter and youtube

title: Lock Me Out 🥇 Freedom from phone addiction
summary: block apps (blacklist or white list) or entire device, for specific session, during specific hours, or when used certain amount of time; also monitor usage and display statistics

title: Lock me!
summary: block selected apps for specified length of time

title: Lokeet
summary: app that displays a simple counter of how many times phone has been unlocked

title: MAD - Mindful Anti Distraction
summary: block blacklisted websites; when trying to enter them, be asked to do something more rewarding instead; block can be overridden by typing in exact message; can also add reason for override here

title: Markdown Anywhere
summary: turns any plain text area input on the web into a distraction-free markdown writing mode when extension is clicked

title: Mattie!
summary: countdown timer that blocks internet connectivity during sessions

title: md writer
summary: distraction-free markdown writer

title: Medium Unhooked
summary: Medium.com feature removal: replaces the newsfeed on the standard front page with a simple prompt to either write something new or work on a draft

title: MeetingTime App | Prevents Distraction in Meetings
summary: app and notification blocking for meetings - set up blocking terms (block all apps? enable silent mode?), then send other meeting participants a meeting code; terms are applied to all participants' phones

title: Mercury Reader
summary: focused reading mode for browser, removes web page navigation, sidebars adverts, non-story images, other dynamic content, to just leave text and images; activated with click

title: Mindful Bells
summary: ring a bell sound at scheduled intervals based on the idea that this will remind the user to focus on what they're trying to achieve

title: Mindful Surfing
summary: closes the browser down (after giving warning) when time limit for session length is hit; shows notifications along the way, which display the length of the current session; can add a whitelist, so that when on one of these sites, the timer doesn't count down

title: Mobile Addiction Meter Pro
summary: tracks how much time has been spent using one's phone in total and how many times it's been 'checked'

title: Mobile Addiction Tracker - Anti Social
summary: track and visualise phone usage; use can be shared with friends

title: Moderamic: Todo, Task Manager, & Block sites
summary: new tab with scenic imagery plus todo list plus relevant bookmarks; lets the user block websites during work sessions; multiple types of blacklist for specific types of work tasks

title: Moment - Screen Time Tracker
summary: track and visualise phone use on iOS; see family's use; get encouragement from a 'coach'; follow missions;

title: Monitro - The App Usage Monitor
summary: tracks usage of specific apps and reminds user when a specified usage limit has passed

title: Morning Remember
summary: get message to pop-up at set intervals, to stay on track during web browsing; in order to get the message pop-up to disappear, the user has to type in the message verbatim

title: Morphine
summary: website blocker in which every 10 minutes you spend on non-blacklisted sites allow you to 'save up' time you are allowed to spend on blacklisted sites

title: Motivation
summary: replaces default new tab pages (which normally contain links to frequently used sites) with a counter displaying the user's current age down to many small, but growing, decimal places

title: Mute Screen Time Tracker
summary: track and visualise global phone use; set goals and get encouragement with notifications and 'filled rings'

title: New Blank Black Tab
summary: makes new tabs blank and black

title: New Tab Clock
summary: replaces the new tab content with a simple, non-distracting clock

title: New Tab Motivation
summary: replace new tab content with motivational quotes

title: News Feed Eradicator for Facebook
summary: Facebook feature removal: replace newsfeed with a motivational quote

title: News Feed Eradicator for LinkedIn
summary: removes newsfeed from linkedIn and replaces it with a 'Get on with work!' message

title: News Feed Hider
summary: Facebook feature removal: hide the newsfeed during specific hours and/or on specific days; replace it with custom text (e.g. 'GET STUFF DONE!')

title: Newsfeed Burner
summary: remove newsfeeds from Linkedin, Facebook and Youtube

title: Night Night
summary: blocks all web pages after a specific time

title: No Alarm
summary: blocks sites from showing notifications and alarms on tab headings

title: No Distractions!
summary: little app where you can set time for the duration of a non-distraction session; during this session, apps will be blocked for a specified duration of time after having been open for specified duration of time; can become active at certain locations or during certain hours

title: Nobile Alarm
summary: set a timer for a period you don't want to use your phone; put the phone on a horizontal surface while it counts down; it triggers an alarm when picked up, and the alarm is removed when the phone is put down again

title: NoFap Panic Button
summary: adds button which the user can press when they struggle to not go on porn websites; clicking the button shows pictures with motivational quotes or redirects the user to pages with motivational content and peer support; also blocks NSFW subreddits and redirect the user

title: NoiceTab
summary: minimal new tab with distraction-free writing

title: NoPhone - This won't let you use your Phone
summary: minimal app launcher, which reduces the home screen to a task manager plus three apps

title: NoPhone Timer - Focus and Productivity Timer
summary: choose amount of time not to use phone; if leaving the app before the countdown is over, the user is sent reminders to stop using the phone and go back to the app

title: Not Now
summary: block websites on a blacklist during scheduled hours or for a session of specified length; can be overridden for 5 mins at the click of a button; show disapproving picture when trying to access blacklisted sites

title: Note'lr
summary: minimal note-taking app

title: NoteFlow - one note for life
summary: minimal note-taking app

title: Nudge
summary: when visiting blacklisted sites, a big slider appears which the user has to drag across to enter; the more frequently the site is visited, the more difficult the slider becomes to drag; also removes side bars from Facebook by default, and can unfollow everyone to empty Facebook's newsfeed; visualises time spent browsing with growing rings

title: Off the Grid - Digital Detox
summary: Block phone access according to a timer or a schedule; sends auto-replies to others trying to get in touch; important contacts can be added to whitelist to let their calls through; make virtual payment of $1 to override and unlock phone.

title: Old Compose | Better Compose Window for Gmail
summary: brings back a previous layout of gmail compose window with a bigger layout that hides your inbox to minimise distraction

title: Own Your Time
summary: prompts the user to type in their motivation for going to a blacklisted site, before they're allowed to enter it

title: Page Eraser
summary: lets the user remove elements from a website with one click; can be configured to not maintain page layout, so that page reorganises itself when elements are removed

title: Papier
summary: turns new tabs into a distraction-free note taking tool

title: PAVLOK Productivity
summary: syncs the PAVLOK wristband with the web browser: set blacklist of distracting sites and/or the maximum number of open tabs allowed, then receive shocks when blacklisted sites are visited or more tabs are opened

title: Pay the Piper
summary: the user adds tasks to a todo-list and distracting sites to a list; when a distracting site is attempted visited, it instead displays a task from the TODO list; if you tick that that at least one todo has been done, it'll give you access for a limited time to the distracting site; the amount of time distractions are allowed after a completed task is customisable

title: Phone Addiction Blocker
summary: locks entire phone for specified amount of time; can't be turned off, even by turning power off

title: Phone Smart - Free Your Time
summary: blocks selected apps during scheduled times - also includes functionality to visualise app usage; auto-reply feature during focus time

title: Phone Usage Monitor
summary: tracks detailed phone usage statistics and displays them numerically

title: Phoneless time counter
summary: counts time spent without unlocking one's phone; collect one point for each 30 mins phone is not unlocked; doesn't count 11pm-8am; displays social leaderboard

title: PhoneUseFree Tracks Usage Time
summary: tracks detailed phone usage - global and checks - and displays it; also calculates an addiction score

title: Pipe Clogger
summary: add delay to distracting sites

title: Pluckeye
summary: blocks images and videos on the web

title: Pocket Points: College Rewards
summary: rewards students for not using their phones during class; points can be exchanged for food or other things at participating merchants; get badges and bonus points when goals are hit (e.g. 'Heating Up: Earn points two days in a row!'); includes leaderboards that can be filtered between 'my school', 'all users' etc; based on the reviews, it will only count study time when at specific locations

title: PorNo! (Beta)
summary: blocker which redirects the user from porn websites to productive websites of their own choice

title: Procrastination Guru
summary: block websites on blacklist for specified time, requires password to override, otherwise can't be turned off

title: Procrastinator
summary: website blocker to block distracting site during scheduled hours; when user tries to access a blacklisted site, the browser displays 'BLOCKED Get back to work' message

title: Prod - To Do List with a Twist
summary: replaces new tab content with todo-list; also allows to block websites and redirect back to todo-list, until todo-list is empty

title: Productiwitty
summary: toggle on a reminder that will (by default) every 15 mins pop up to remind the user to stay focused

title: Purify
summary: converts news articles into a minimalistic view that only displays the content and uses all available screen space to do this

title: QualityTime - My Digital Diet
summary: tracks and visualises smartphone use; gives the user notifications if usage is above certain set limits; also include focus time sessions during which notifications and calls are blocked and only some apps are allowed

title: Quick Write Text Editor
summary: Minimalistic web-based text editor. Opened by clicking the extension icon.

title: Quip Helper
summary: Quip (a service which is kinda like google docs directed at businesses) feature 'minimiser': adds the option of a full-screen editing

title: Quora Feed Eradicator
summary: removes feed from Quora

title: Rational Life-Screen Time Log
summary: tracks and visualises global use; set limit goals and get reminders; see how the actual global usage compares to set goals

title: Reader View
summary: reader mode, explicitly copied from Safari's reader mode; extract out just the content in distraction-free layout at the click of a button

title: RealizD - Track how much you use your phone
summary: track smartphone usage; set limiting goals and get reminders when use is higher than desired; can track multiple devices so can be used for family

title: Reddit Feed Eradicator
summary: Reddit feature removal: remove the homepage news feed

title: Reddit Hide Sidebar
summary: Reddit feature removal: provides option to hide the right sidebar

title: Reddups -- Reminds to stay healthy
summary: set periodic reminders (e.g. every 15 minutes) to drink water or do pushups, while browsing the web

title: Refrain
summary: block websites on blacklist in Safari on iOS; can work in schedules

title: Remove Twitter Notifications
summary: hides notification number on Twitter

title: RescueTime for Chrome and Chrome OS
summary: by the same company as the RescueTime app; track time spent in chrome, break down in productive/distracting time and by sites; get reminders when e.g. 1 hour has been spent in 'entertainment'; has focus mode where distracting sites are blocked

title: RescueTime Time Management
summary: track and visualise time spent in apps, websites, and phone calls; automatically categorised; weekly summary reports; premium version offers FocusTime distraction blocker (block websites on desktop; silence sound and notifications on mobile); get alerts when too much time is spent on distractions, or encouragement when goals are hit

title: Reservi: Smartphone Addiction Timer Lock
summary: locks all apps on a smartphone during pre-scheduled times, only allow emergency calls

title: Restraint
summary: adds button that can block the current website for X minutes - then when the site is visited, show the amount of minutes left before the site is available to visit again

title: Rocket Readability
summary: reader mode which uses readability.js to cut out content and display it distraction free

title: Rooster for Chrome
summary: tracks and visualises time on websites; time limits can be set; if time limit is exceeded, the rooster gets angry and the user is notified of this; user receives push notifications when they start to visit websites declared as unproductive

title: Rudraum Anti-Addiction
summary: locks phone for a set amount of time (only calls are let through)

title: Sax
summary: limits time on blacklisted sites - when time is up, the site will be overlaid with the epic sax guy

title: Screen Mask
summary: reader mode - put dark overlay on whole screen, except for paragraphs being tracked by the mouse or touch

title: Screen-Free Timer - digital detox & focus training
summary: start a timer for a period you want to not use your phone, get a notification that you failed the challenge if you leave the app; collect time non-used in a scoreboard

title: SE Block
summary: removes the 'distracting' sidebar from Stack Overflow

title: Self Control
summary: blocks websites on blacklist - can either work in sessions or always; always-on by default; blocklist can't be changed while session is running

title: Self-Control to Focus - Lite
summary: generates random weird and complicated password, gets the user to replace their current passwords to sites they'd like to block themselves from with this, then the user sets timer to duration until the app will show the password again, so the sites again can be accessed

title: SelfControl
summary: uses an app called 'DeskTime' to determine productivity; when user has been unproductive for a set amount of time, distracting websites are redirected to productive site of choice

title: SelfControl
summary: tracks and displays amount of time spent on websites; websites on blacklist can be blocked either during certain times or when certain amount of time has been spent on them

title: SELFLOCK - Lockscreen usage
summary: tracks how many times the user unlocks the home screen, and shows whether that exceeded the goal they set

title: SendOnly | Distraction Killer
summary: hides everything on Gmail except for the compose button, by default, so that information from the inbox doesn't distract the user

title: Shurbit
summary: blocks distracting sites (have default list and extra ones can be added) - show DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME GO WORK message when trying to access distracting sites; record and display (when icon is clicked) how many times the user has tried to access distracting sites

title: Sidekick Mattie!
summary: blocks internet access for specified duration - pomodoro principle with X minutes internet-free, then Y minutes break

title: Siempo - The Phone for Humans
summary: replaces home screen with simple intention reminder; replaces app launching with minimalistic, unbranded interface; can randomly scramble the order of 'distracting' apps; batch notifications; greyscale app icons

title: Sigi Smart Mobile Silencer - Free
summary: silences phone at specific locations, during specific hours, or when certain ppl call

title: Simple Blocker
summary: block websites on blacklist for set duration of time; password has to be typed in in order to tinker with settings or turn off

title: Simpleology Browser Add-on w/ Focus Enforcer
summary: thought-catching tool that also has a blocking mode (whitelist or blacklist) in which pages are either blocked and redirected to your Daily Targets, or a pop-up reminds you to do your daily targets before browsing mindlessly; can also permanently display current task one is trying to complete at the top of the screen and make it flash every few minutes (customisable)

title: Simpletext
summary: minimal writing app - completely bare-bones with no titles or buttons of any kind

title: Site Blocker
summary: safari iOS website blocker where sessions can be initiated, scheduled, or one can be 'locked-in' to only have access to one site

title: SiteMon
summary: tracks how much time are spent on which websites, and visualises it in a pie chart

title: SleepTown
summary: Similar mechanism to Forest, but targeted at achieving a regular sleep schedule and building a city. User sets a goal of bedtime and getting-up time; open the bedtime app before going to bed; virtual building is being constructed while not using your phone; building is being destroyed if phone is used before the set get-up time; buildings live on in a virtual city; additional rewards are collected for doing this right days in a row

title: SlideShare Theater
summary: removes sidebar and other features from SlideShare

title: Sloth Worth
summary: counts the time spent on blacklisted sites, and displays how much money could've been earned by working instead (user can set an hourly rate); also reports daily, weekly, and monthly stats

title: SmartDetox - Smartphone addiction prevention
summary: tracks and visualises global and app usage; can lock the device (passcode needed to override); displays 'addictometer' and warnings

title: Smartphone Junkie Alarm
summary: tracks usage of specific apps or entire device; allows you to set time limits and then get reminders when the limit has passed

title: Social Habit Disruption
summary: displays big 'KICK THE HABIT' with a warning sign when user goes to Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Instagram, Reddit, Tumblr and YouTube; the user can request access for X minutes, then click a 'I promise' button to proceed; pop-up appears when time has passed

title: Social Lock
summary: blocks selected apps for specific duration of time

title: Social Rehab
summary: blocks Facebook, Twitter, and Google+

title: SPACE - Find your phone/life balance
summary: tracks and visualises global time spent; set reminders if the user is on their phone for longer than X minutes or unlocks her phone too frequently; can dim the screen when limit is hit; can set goals and track progress against them ('unlock achievements to build a galaxy as you hit your goals'), or against other users; can also mute notifications during specific hours; also 'understand what user you are' ("boredom battler, social sticky-mitt, rabbit hole wanderer or busy bee"); can also block apps

title: Space - You Need a Breather
summary: app which launches before you try to launch other apps which the user categorises as distracting, asking the user to take a 'moment of space', before the target app is launched

title: Spotlight
summary: draw rectangle around any part of a webpage, then get a dark overlay over everything else

title: Stay Focused - App Block
summary: block blacklisted apps for session, after used for specific time, or during specific hours; also track and visualise global and app usage; can be set to require password to change settings, or prevent uninstallation

title: Stay Focused - Every Second Counts
summary: measure the time spent within this app (which signifies non-use); then compare that to others around the world

title: Stop Animations
summary: stops animations on a website when esc is pressed

title: Stop Autopilot
summary: track and visualise how much time are spent on various websites; display this as distracting vs. non-distracting; block or redirect sites on blacklist; get notifications when on blacklisted sites

title: Stop Scrolling Newsfeed for Facebook
summary: Facebook feature removal: hides the newsfeed by default; asks the user if they really need to scroll it, and if so, for how long - then displays it for X minutes

title: Stoppable
summary: blocks websites on a blacklist and shows a customisable motivational message instead - to temporarily override blocking, the motivational message must be typed in verbatim

title: StopProcrastination
summary: block websites on blacklist or only allow those on a whitelist; can be scheduled

title: Strict Workflow
summary: combination of website blocker and pomodoro timer; block websites (whitelist or blacklist) for 25 mins, then let them available for 5 mins

title: Strippr
summary: reader mode - remove everything except for the content of the article being read

title: Studdy Buddy Deluxe
summary: start work session for specific length; during this time, tabs with 'distracting websites' (not customisable) are automatically deleted; when focus session is over, be rewarded with sound of children cheering

title: Study More
summary: automatically close down a tab when the user tries to access websites on (uncustomisable) blacklist, e.g. Facebook

title: Study Smart Free  - Application Blocker
summary: blocks distracting apps during study sessions; has a calendar that can show upcoming exams; study sessions and their blocked apps can then be tied to that exam; collect virtual money which you can lose if you stop the session before time is up

title: Substitute Phone
summary: little app on which you can make the movements that you habitually do with your phone (swiping, etc) but where the only effect is to move animated beads around

title: Switch Off
summary: allow blacklisted websites to be accessed only during specific hours, and for a specific duration; also limit number of tabs than can be open at the same time

title: Tab Keeper
summary: if more than X tabs are open, then auto-closes tabs that have been inactive for more than Y minutes; remembers up to Z closed tabs to easily get them back; specified tabs can be exempted from being auto-closed

title: Tab Wrangler
summary: if more than X tabs are open, then auto-closes tabs that have been inactive for more than Y minutes; remembers up to Z closed tabs to easily get them back; specified tabs can be exempted from being auto-closed

title: Tabagotchi by Breather
summary: replaces new tab content with an animated 'tabagochi' which get's healthier the fewer tabs are open, and sicker the more are open; for each hour spent with less than 5 tabs open, it has a chance of evolving into a new creature

title: Tabminder
summary: let the user set time limit for distracting sites; when a blacklisted site is visited, the timer counts down; when the time is up, the user is prompted to close the tab or to restart the timer

title: Take A Break
summary: adds an icon to the toolbar which flashes every 15 mins to remind the user to take a short break; a pop-up comes every hour reminding the user to take a big break

title: Tell Me on a Sunday
summary: Facebook feature removal: hide menu button with notifications, except on Sundays

title: Terribly Dumb Launcher Pro -Distraction Free Phone
summary: reduces the home screen to three choices - call, text, or use a specific app of choice

title: The MILK App
summary: get points for not using your phone while a timer counts down; these points can be exchanged for free stuff and discounts in the real world

title: The Perfect Day
summary: Manually track time spent on phone.

title: Theater Mode
summary: theater mode' - when a video plays, gives the option to darken the rest of the screen

title: Tick: Task Management
summary: another Forest clone: pomodoro timer where you plant trees and grow fruits, that are only completed if you don't use your phone while it's going; shows statistics of progress

title: TidyTube
summary: YouTube feature removal - removes the recommended videos, trending videos, and sidebar

title: Time Guard - Protect Your Time
summary: blocks websites on a blocklist by default; the user can request breaks for specified duration

title: Time Manager
summary: tracks how much time has been spent on websites and visualises it in a pie chart

title: Time Snatch
summary: put websites on a blocklist, and either block them entirely or only allow them to be visited for specified amount of time per day; if they're attempted visited, the user sees either a motivational quote or are redirected to a productive site of their choice

title: Time: Defeat Distraction
summary: countdown timer for a specific task; if app is left while the countdown is running, get notifications reminding you of the task you're trying to complete; see history of whether you managed to finish tasks before timer ran out

title: Timewarp
summary: add sites to a blacklist, then when the user visits them, they are either shown a motivational quote, redirected to another page, or shown a persistent banner with the amount of time spent on the site

title: Timewaste Timer
summary: the user transfers money to a deposit account; then if Facebook is accessed for more than 1 hour in a day, $1 is paid to the developer from the account

title: Todobook
summary: replace Facebook's (and a list of other social media sites) newsfeed with a todo list; when all todos have been completed, it unlocks 5 mins of newsfeed; can optionality be scheduled to only be turned on during work hours
Feature min.: Site: Facebook, LinkedIn, YouTube, Reddit, Twitter, Product Hunt, Hacker News

title: Town Timer - be focused and keep track of time
summary: variation on Forest: set time for not using your phone, then it constructs a building during the countdown which is destroyed if leaving the app; the buildings can be used to populate a city; bigger buildings can be constructed using points earned

title: Twitter Distraction Remover
summary: can hide various elements from twitter - e.g. notifications, sidebar, media

title: Twitter UnHooked
summary: Twitter feature removal: removes trends sidebar, who-to-follow sidebar, and changes notifications count to be 'less attention-grabbing'

title: Twitter Wide and Clear
summary: Twitter feature removal: makes feed full-width and removes image/video/media previews

title: twt
summary: Twitter feature removal: removes ads and promotions and sidebars; also adds full-width view of content

title: UBhind: No.1 Mobile Life Tracker/Addiction Manager
summary: tracks and visualises smartphone use; breaks usage down by category; enables user to set time limits; can send the user daily reports; can either send reminders when time limit is hit ('good cop') or lock phone (for everything except whitelisted apps) when limit is hit ('bad cop')

title: UnhookMe
summary: Tracks and visualises phone unlocks and usage time. Offers rewards for better scores. Features a little character to motivate the user

title: Unplug 2-Track your phone time
summary: track global use; set daily limits and earn symbolic trophies when reaching goals

title: Urgent Call Pro
summary: blocks calls and texts, except when they come from certain ppl or match certain conditions (e.g. if someone calls 3 times within 15 mins)

title: Use Wisely - Say No to Phone Addiction
summary: set limits for how much you want to use specific apps and overall phone usage, then receive reminders when the time is up; also tracks and visualises usages

title: Warlock -- Device Disabler
summary: locks the entire device for specified time, only allowing emergency calls

title: WATCHFUL PROTECTOR
summary: set time limits for how long distracting sites can be used before they are blocked; also track time spent on those sites and visualise it with line graphs; puts obstacles in the way of overriding or removing sites from the blacklist; tries to disincentivize uninstalling by warning that all usage data tracked will then be lost forever

title: Web Blocker Pro *ROOT*
summary: blocks websites on blocklist; still blocked even if app is uninstalled; password required to change settings

title: Whitelist Manager
summary: block all websites not on the user's whitelist

title: WideArea
summary: lets the user expand text input areas to be distraction-free full screen, at the click of a button

title: Work Mode
summary: allows the user to toggle on 'work mode' where blacklisted sites are blocked; timer displays how long the user has been in work mode

title: Wormhole Escaper
summary: ads icon that the user can click whenever they find themselves tempted to go down a path of distraction on the web, but manages not to - it then displays a few words of encouragement ('Wormhole avoided! Great job!'); the icon also displays the count of escaped wormholes for the day (resets to zero at 4am)

title: Writer
summary: minimal writing app

title: Writer (Simple Offline Word Processor)
summary: adds short cut to the app Writer, a minimalist distraction-free writing interface

title: WriteTab
summary: replaces new tab content with a minimal writing tool

title: Yogurt
summary: track and visualise how often tabs and tasked are switched

title: You're still here.
summary: adds occasional 'you're still here' pop-up on distracting websites

title: YourHour - phone addiction tracker and controller
summary: track and visualise phone usage relative to goals set for amount of time overall, number of unlocks or time in specific apps; also see which kind of category of phone user (illustrated with little turtles that are more or less addicted to their phones) you are...

title: YouTube Cleaner
summary: YouTube feature removal: removes recommended videos, comments, and disables auto-play; can be turned off by pressing the extension icon

title: Youtube Distraction Eliminator
summary: YouTube feature removal: hide next videos and homepage

title: youtube distraction free
summary: adds button which when toggle on removes recommended video links from YouTube and also displays a counter of how many minutes has allegedly been saved by doing using the extensions

title: YouTube Distraction Free Mode
summary: adds button which removes everything from YouTube, except for the video being watched

title: YouTube Distraction Remover
summary: YouTube feature removal: hide video feed and sidebar

title: Youtube UnHooked
summary: YouTube feature removal: hides recommendations, related videos, and comments

title: YouWork
summary: YouTube feature removal - simplifies to only search and search results

title: Zenotes
summary: replaces new tab content with simple todo-list with distraction-free notetaking in markdown

title: ZenScreen
summary: companion chrome extension for the ZenScreen iOS and Android apps; allow tracking of chrome activity and to block it from further use during scheduled hours, when activity limit has been reached, or for session of specific duation; also includes visualisation of usage statistics

title: ZenScreen - Track and limit screen time
summary: track phone use; initiate or schedule block sessions or daily limits

title: ZenTab
summary: only allows one tab to be open per window
